dict.string:
. "$TM_SUPPORT_PATH/lib/html.sh"
OPTIONS="--word-wrap -C" # -C is line numbers #OPTIONS="$OPTIONS --landscape"
lang=$(perl <<<$TM_SCOPE -pe 's/.*?\b(?:source|text)\.([^. ]*).*/$1/') case "$lang" in c++) lang="cpp" ;; objc++) lang="objc" ;; shell) lang="sh" ;; esac
if ! enscript --help-pretty-print|grep -sq "^Name: $lang\$" then lang="" fi
header="${TM_FILENAME:-untitled}|%W|Page \$% of \$=" pstopdf <(enscript -T$TM_TAB_SIZE -o - -E$lang $OPTIONS --header="$header") -o /tmp/out.pdf && redirect tm-file://localhost/tmp/out.pdf
